member.name: T:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions
member.summary: Collection of generic WixSharp extension methods

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions.Is64OS
member.summary: Returns true if the OS (this routine is executed on) has an x64 CPU architecture.

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions.ToPath(System.Environment.SpecialFolder)
member.summary: Returns full path of the

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions.AsWixVarToPath(System.String)
member.summary:
'Interprets' a string as a WiX constant and expands into a proper File System path. For example "DesktopFolder" will be expanded into "[SysDrive]:\Users\[user]\Desktop". This method is a logical equivalent of C# Environment.GetFolderPath. Though it handles discrepancies between 'special folders' mapping in .NET and WiX.
The method will always be called from x86 runtime as MSI always loads ManagedUI in x86 host. From the other hand CustomActions are called in the deployment specific CPU type context.

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions.PathJoin(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Equivalent of .

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.Extensions.PathGetDirName(System.String)
member.summary: Identical to . It is useful for Wix# consuming code as it allows avoiding "using System.IO;" directive, which interferes with Wix# types.

member.name: M:WixSharp.Msi.EmbedTransform.Do(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Embeds a language transformation (mst file) in the specified msi file.

Queries the name of the product from the encapsulated MSI database.
The DB view is not closed after the call

member.summary:
Queries the version of the product from the encapsulated MSI database.
The DB view is not closed after the call

member.summary:
Queries the code of the product from the encapsulated MSI database.
The DB view is not closed after the call

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiParser.IsInstalled(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified product code is installed.
member.returns: Returns true if the product is installed. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiParser.IsInstalled
member.summary: Determines whether the product from the encapsulated msi file is installed.
member.returns: Returns true if the product is installed. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiParser.GetDirectoryPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full path of the directory entry from the Directory MSI table

member.summary: Releases the acquired resources

member.name: T:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession
member.summary:
Generic class that represents runtime properties of the MSI setup session as well as some runtime properties of the product being installed (e.g. CodePage, Caption). It also Simplifies MSI execution and provides automatic responses on the MSI Messages.
Normally MsiSession should be extended top meet the needs of the product (MSI) specific setup.

member.name: E:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when setup progress changed.

member.name: E:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.SetupComplete
member.summary: Occurs when setup completes.

member.name: E:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.SetupStarted
member.summary: Occurs when setup starts.

member.name: E:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ActionStarted
member.summary: Occurs when new setup action started.

member.name: F:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.InUiThread
member.summary: The UI thread marshalling delegate. It should be set for the environments where cross-thread calls must be marshalled (e.g. WPF, WinForms). Not needed otherwise (e.g. Console application).

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ProgressTotal
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress total.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ProgressCurrentPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress current position.

member.name: F:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ProgressStepDelay
member.summary: The progress step delay. It is a "for-testing" feature. Set it to positive value (number of milliseconds) to artificially slow down the installation process. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.CurrentActionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the current action.
member.value: The name of the current action.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the product language.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.CodePage
member.summary: Gets or sets the product CodePage.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.CanCancel
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag indication the the user can cancel the setup in progress.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the setup window caption.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.IsProgressForwardDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the progress steps are changing in the forward direction.
member.value: true if the progress changes are in forward direction; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.CancelRequested
member.summary: Gets or sets the CancelRequested flag. It should beset to true if user wants to cancel the setup in progress.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnActionData(System.String)
member.summary: Called when ActionData MSI message is received.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnError(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{WindowsInstaller.MsiInstallMessage})
member.summary: Called when Error event occurs (MSI Error message is received or an internal error condition triggered).
member.param: if set to true the error is fatal.
Type of the related message. Note the error may be associated with the internal error condition (e.g. exception is raised).

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Called when Warning MSI message is received.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnUser(System.String)
member.summary: Called when User MSI message is received.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Called when Info MSI message is received.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.EnableLog(System.String,WindowsInstaller.MsiInstallLogMode)
member.summary: Enables the MSI runtime logging to the specified log file.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ExecuteInstall(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the install sequence from the specified MSI file.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.ExecuteUninstall(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the uninstall sequence from the specified MSI file.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.Execute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the MSI file with the specified MSI parameters.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnMessage(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Called when MSI message is received. It is actual the MSI Message Loop.
member.param: Type of the message. This value get's combined with MessageIcon and a MessageButtons values. Use to extract the value.
member.returns: The integer as per MSI documentation.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.OnMessage(System.String,WindowsInstaller.MsiInstallMessage)
member.summary: Called when MSI message is received. It is actual the MSI Message Loop.
member.returns: The integer as per MSI documentation.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.MsiErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code of the last MSI install action (e.g. MsiInterop.MsiInstallProduct call).

member.name: E:WixSharp.UI.MsiSession.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when some of the current instance property changed.

member.name: T:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup
member.summary: Generic class that represents runtime properties of the typical MSI setup. It is a ViewModel class, which has 'value changed' events for all bindable properties automatically marshalled for the cross-thread calls.

member.name: F:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.MsiFile
member.summary: The path to the encapsulated MSI file.

member.name: F:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.LogFile
member.summary: The path to the MSI session log file.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.StartInstall(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the fresh installation.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.StartRepair(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the repair installation for the already installed product.

member.name: M:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.StartUninstall(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the uninstallation of the already installed product.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.ErrorStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets the error status.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.ProductStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets the product status (installed or not installed).

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.ProductVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the product version.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.ProductName
member.summary: Gets or sets the MSI ProductName.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the setup is in progress.
member.value: true if this setup is in progress; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.NotStarted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether setup was not started yet. This information can be useful for implementing "not started" UI state in the setup GUI.
member.value: true if setup was not started; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.IsCurrentlyInstalled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is currently installed.
member.value: true if the product is currently installed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.CanInstall
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the product can be installed.
member.value: true if the product can install; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.CanUnInstall
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the product can be uninstalled.
member.value: true if the product can uninstall; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.CanRepair
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the product can be repaired.
member.value: true if the product can repaired; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WixSharp.UI.GenericSetup.LogFileCreated
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the log file created.
member.value: true if the log file created; otherwise, false.
